name: Cooking Master Adventure
description:
Are you good at time management? Can you beat the clock and become a top master chef? Build the cooking city from start-up restaurants, cook and serve delicious foods from all over the world in this fast-paced addictive cooking game. Cooking Master Adventure will definitely bring you enjoyable cooking game experiences like never before.
Dive yourself into a real cooking craze, play as a chef like you have a cooking fever. find the secret cooking diary and unlock all the culinary skills. Very simple to play, and with well organized kitchen layouts, you can make any food in a dash without remembering the recipes.

Features:
• COOK hundreds of delicious recipes from around the world!
• OPEN dozens of restaurants and cafés in the cooking city and decorate them to your taste!
• COMPLETE the daily quests with lots of rewards!
• WIN the weekly challenges with rich prizes!
• INTERACT with the customers in the restaurant and immerse yourself in an exciting story!
• PLAY on multiple devices freely once logged in with Apple ID or Facebook.

More levels are coming, and more exciting features are being added to the game. Please stay tuned to us.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/cooking.master.adventure
